Reviews.Title: “A perfect little basic hotel with great staff”

Reviews.Content: playing band club round corner spent nights pera rose perfectly nice staff superfriendly helpful didnt mind dining record acoustic session youtube waiting taxi leave highly recommended

Reviews.Content: stayed nights november 2011 home weeks turkish coast size clean electric kettle location easy access pera museum istiklal cad wonderful street mezze restaurants left hotel staff helpful airport transfers arriving departing

Reviews.Content: booked double 2 7th floor walk roombut bed water air condition breakfast staff okthe hotel wonderfull easy istiklal st galata metro main noise walls thin corridor waiting lift easily hear noises hotel deserve 4 star 3 star suits

Reviews.Title: “good value for your money”
Reviews.Author: baumkrone
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 days hotel satisfied booked single triple view golden horn clean daily housekeeping attentive perfect bottle vine complimentary electric kettle free tea coffee minibar fair prices slippers shampoo conditioner hair dryer sewing kit nail file tv international programmes etc breakfast varied staff friendly courteous basement hotel spa sauna turkish bath fitness spa tulip hotel meters pera rose sauna turkish bath bigger fitness swimming pool whirlpool offer massages fair prices hotel located lots bars restaurants clubs loud weekends sensitive dont forget earplugs stay awake celebrate people street minus checkin told block 1 night credit card deposit blocked total amount bit strange internet free improvement sometimes slow day 2 days key card system bit annoying wasnt guest happy stay hotel recommend value money

Reviews.Title: “Clean and good location, marred only by a lack of sleep”
Reviews.Author: Gozzies
Reviews.Content: pera rose staff tasty breakfasts coffee book clean stayed 3 nights november tour husband exterior facing alley kids interior facing courtyard lack view didnt bother nightclub kicked evening 0400 unbelievable nightclub earplugs exaggerate noise bad sleep 2 nights moved floor 3rd night staff moved floor amazing overlooked alley nightclub wore earplugs sleep pretty laid travel sleep recommendation stay nightclub especially children day stay specified

Reviews.Title: “Great beyoglu hotel, super clean, very friendly.”
Reviews.Author: Jon S
Reviews.Content: stayed nights initial error booking view golden horn hotel clean staff nice friendly front house staff cleaners price highly recommend hotel breakfast isnt thats standard istanbul hotels id recommend heading caffe brunch instead definitely stay hotel space return istanbul soon

Reviews.Title: “excellent service and very good location”

Reviews.Content: recall stay hotel family month july 3 days unforgettable congratulate exceptionally run hotel express appreciation gratitude superior service received stay wish thank assistance cooperation whilst deserve deal praise excellent customer service friendliness courtesy helpfulness reception staff ibrahim service staff words thanks praise serviced standard facilities 1st class stay enjoyable chance doubt stay hotel â€¦ thank excellent holiday

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel but avoid saturday night”
Reviews.Author: vng11
Reviews.Content: favourite istanbul spent 4 days sultanhamet decided move bosphorus booked standard hotel divine surprise discover suite jacuzzi 2 tv sets lounge hotel comfortable staff friendly location surrounded nightclubs bars noisy saturday nights happily sunday spent night breakfast buffet perfect choose 6 cheeses improve knowledge turkish speciality experience

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value, great amenities”
Reviews.Author: daytona22t
Reviews.Content: stayed total 5 nights location steps istiklal cadessi nightlife hotel close metro stops tunel wifi flawlessly stay strong signal view golden horn huge clean comfortable double bed twin bed shower plenty hot water water pressure morning breakfast nice cheese olives fruit eggs bread tea preserves juice coffee spread complain breakfast expecting pancakes turkey tampa hammam clean reasonably priced staff friendly helpful hotel lacks frills definitely value paid 100night substantially similar hotels street definitely recommend hotel stay return istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Definately average”

Reviews.Content: reading comments doubts hotel coffee tea facilities tea bags replaced wifi free slowly reception friendly rest hard smile breakfast 4 days little variety view brick wall mixture admit left mobile phone day called saved

Reviews.Content: istanbul 2 weeks ago stay pera rose hotel location junior suite 3 persons found perfect excellent easily town found restaurants super stay shopping drink walking massage hotel delicious experience

Reviews.Title: “perfect location”

Reviews.Content: price dont value money friends stayed 5 altogether bit weekends noisy night due bars clubs neighbouring streets join nightlife altogether clean comfortable beds opposite famous pera palace 2 minutes istiklal street 10 minutes galata tower taxi drivers usually dont hotel altogether care 3 taxis direction 2 drivers 15 liras route 60 beter tell pera palace ot marmara pera 50 meters ont street

Reviews.Title: “Happy Stay,”

Reviews.Content: stay pera rose honey moon 13th jan till 18th jan tour operator egypt recommend hotel hotel deserve recommended hotel taksim sleep shopping fun taksim stuff friendly helpful restaurant food yummy clean nice scent logic budget recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “GOOD HOTEL GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: alexandra1975
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights february cant complain perfectly nice hotel staff excelent hotel includes free wireless internet stay near istiklal street lots restaurant near size clean sea view time pera rose

Reviews.Title: “Horrible hotel, if you're planning on staying there trust me, DON'T!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: sarah600Beirut
Reviews.Content: location alright 7 minutes walk street corner theres street clubs nice staff sooo rude mean sont believe theyre nice helpful pay 2 extra nights 1 night checked 15 minutes late pay night didnt notify cancellation 24 hours ahead soon enter hotel greeted sewage smell lobby smell rotten sound heater loud cant sleep hear coming streets hear single door restaurant breakfast poor ate cereal tiny literally tiny booked double friend doesnt qualify single single bed cant move wasnt luggage bed bathroom sleep theres window lights extremely dim makes feel depressed time bed pillow comfortable alll woke neck pain massage day theres wifi wifi lobby sucks disconnecting fitness 3 machines cant evn walk treadmill squeezed corner booked 3 nights checked night 1 unbareable hotels street hotel price marmara taksim hotel taksim square close shops busses metros stayed marmara taksim amazing pamper tomorrow

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service does make a Difference”
Reviews.Author: AM8062
Reviews.Content: ive read previous reviews agree standard ones vacation wouldnt mind location extremely probably wouldnt spend time travelling agency booked standard 4 night business trip spend lot time hotel wouldve appreciated table chair apparently didnt enought agency isnt hotels fault accommodated included bed minibar hotels receptionist extremely understanding helpfull requested possibility change tablechair day suitable purposes couple extra beds gorgeus view anyhow reason write review fantastic customer service hotel couldnt friendly attentative book hotel future agency reserve facilities happen istanbul vacation hotel definitely top list

Reviews.Title: “Not what we expected!!”
Reviews.Author: emeyg
Reviews.Content: stayed pera rose hotel september 3 nights didnt hotel reasons staff effecient unfriendly elevators wifi 7th floor breakfast avarage liked hotel near street walk children street bars reach street

Reviews.Title: “Great for 3 people - room with 2 beds plus extra room with comfy sleeper”
Reviews.Author: Cari37
Reviews.Content: friends visit istanbul stay shop main street evening eat food easy city bridge using tram breakfast super helpful staff definitely turkish bath downstairs tell staff heat steam sauna

Reviews.Title: “despite booking well in advance they bumped us to the sister hotel down the road”
Reviews.Author: sez41london
Reviews.Content: booked hotel recommended friend arrived told water leak sent pera tulip road simply doublebooked people checking arrival pera tulip twin double booked fuss double poky staff hotels unapologetic werent impressed wouldnt recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not a four star hotel, room with window next to wall,they stole our money!!!”
Reviews.Author: SofieVdB
Reviews.Content: 11th time visited istanbul experience hotels stayed sister hotel pera tulip difference window immediately facing wall daylight coming clean 2 days change finally agreed bit bigger emptied safe found 150 euro missing safe immediately contacted reception send manager resume investigation happened card system maintenance safe 2 times day fix light am 100 hotel money compensation moved triple nice double cleaning windows facing wall hotel cheap maybe option dont money safe pay normal rate please choose hotel options mention lots noise nighttime construction sites nearby hotel review true heard

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: ziega
Reviews.Content: ve stayed nights ive chosen hotel based trip advisor rating travelers reviews wasnt disappointed clean 1st night changing space luggage politely changed staff helpful breakfast ok definitely

Reviews.Content: stayed pera rose tripple january 2010 week busy day time city left hotel breakfast hotel late evening positive hotel location heart istanbul 50 meters underground metro station 10 meters taxi stop 50 meters istiklal street cafe restaurants etc clean comfortable furniture stuff hotel condition breakfast hotel staff reception helpful friendly rates reasonable level negative hotel poor set channels available tv free alternative pay tv card costs 15 dollars plenty channels adults construction near hotel
